Trade/Device Name(s): Multipurpose System for In Vitro Coagulation Studies
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Analyte(s): Speed of Clot Formation (CFT and alpha angle)
Methodologies: Measurement of blood clot elasticity and firmness
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ROTEM delta Thromboelastometry System and EXTEM, FIBTEM, APTEM assays for in vitro monitoring of blood coagulation via extrinsic pathway, platelet function blockade, and antifibrinolytic evaluation in citrated whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Semi-quantitative in vitro diagnostic assays on the ROTEM delta Thromboelastometry System to monitor coagulation process and clot firmness in adult citrated whole blood specimens, including in transplantation, cardiovascular surgery, cardiology procedures, and trauma assessment
